Reviews.Title: “Cheap but very simple - OK if you only need a bed close to Victoria”

Reviews.Content: actually bathroom enter clean ok ok breakfast double incl breakfast ok walking distance victoria station dont plan spend minutes awake ok bed

Reviews.Title: “Shabby, awful - I wouldn't stay even if there was no charge”

Reviews.Content: planned stay 2 nights business trip bulk hotels booked due chelsea flower door bedroom stepped shower cubicle carpets dirty shoes bedding dirty smelled clean towel lie top receptionist talking phone booking 3 floors bags lift didnt try breakfast stayed 1 night checked soon dont stay

Reviews.Title: “Expencive, bad smelling room”
Reviews.Author: Frk-Lillehagen
Reviews.Content: mom spent 2 nights hotel hotel location short walk victoria station stops painted ugly pink color smell sewage bad window closed blowing cold time fire able slept hotels uk breakfast included price bad unless eat cornflakes orange marmelade option pay breakfast dont close train station worth price

Reviews.Title: “A complete joke to call it a hotel”
Reviews.Author: spatin
Reviews.Content: stayed night flight cancelled due snow stay near victoria wasnt else available hotels worse receptionist told wasnt triple available book 2 afraid stay son husband didnt stayed dont understand authorities dont close filthy fire dont believe survive 2 sidebyside bedroom doors cant time bathroom joke actually pass shower reach toilet seated toilet feet remain inside shower bed covers havent seen water recent months sheets towels clean didnt breakfast left morning

Reviews.Title: “we had no problems!!!”
Reviews.Author: neweth
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed vegas hotel 3 nights 15th november 18th orginally booked 4 nights decided leave night due check night train home hotel avoid rush morning stayed 16 top floor double fairly toilet sleep ok bathroom clean bed everyday clean towels toilet roll added shower hot sometimes wasnt issue didnt bedding blanket sheet throw normal duvet allright top floor 6 flights stairs didnt complain excersise ha staff guys time friendly helpful hotel situated lots shops takeaways resturaunts close victoria station stay easier didnt breakfast cant comment fry cereal toast plenty cafes wont trouble overall reccoment looking luxury looking head day sightseeing fairly priced clean warm doorstep

Reviews.Title: “Great experiance for a London weekend”

Reviews.Content: slept vegas hotel 1 night week payed â£55 twin bed payed clean sheets towels soaps ok breakfast nice staff arrived checkin allowed leave bags london bus tour yes hotel bad tv perfectly
